user.title: Add a settlement
user.description:
Enter the settlement ID.
Click [here](https://www.nnk.gov.hu/index.php/kornyezetegugy/kornyezetegeszsegugyi-laboratoriumi-osztaly/vizhigienes-laboratorium/ivoviz/magyarorszagi-telepulesek-ivovizminosege.html) to find your settlement. After opening the settlement page, copy the number after "&id=" from the URL.
